food.name: Sushi
food.description: Sushi is a traditional Japanese dish made with vinegared rice and various ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.
food.details: Sushi has a long history dating back to ancient Japan when it was originally developed as a method of preserving fish by fermenting it with rice. Today, sushi is enjoyed worldwide as a culinary art form. Popular types of sushi include Nigiri, Maki, and Sashimi. Sushi chefs are trained to perfection, ensuring each piece is both a visual and flavorful masterpiece.

food.name: Tacos
food.description: Tacos are a traditional Mexican dish consisting of small hand-sized tortillas topped with a variety of fillings.
food.details: Tacos offer endless customization possibilities, with popular variations such as Carne Asada, Al Pastor, and Fish Tacos. Each taco tells a story of Mexican heritage and culinary innovation, celebrated worldwide as a favorite street food.

food.name: Street Food
food.description: Street food offers a variety of affordable and delicious meals from different cultures, served quickly and conveniently.
food.details: Street food is a celebration of culture and flavor. From skewers to dumplings, it provides a unique opportunity to experience local culinary traditions. Street food is loved for its affordability, accessibility, and fresh preparation.
